statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Your task is to calculate the sum of some integers.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: Input contains an integer N in the first line, and then N lines follow. Each line starts with a integer M, and then M integers follow in the same line.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each group of input integers you should output their sum in one line, and you must note that there is a blank line between outputs.
